channel.title: CNN brk
channel.description: 这是一个追踪CNN brknews的种子

item.title: 众议院投票通过关键的政府支出法案，参议院在今晚快速逼近的停摆最后期限前展开冲刺。
item.description:
The House votes to approve key government spending bills, setting off a sprint in the Senate ahead of a fast-approaching shutdown deadline tonight. https://t.co/kEpgei3jIY

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 22, 2024

item.title: 警方称，一名大学生在离开纳什维尔一家酒吧后失踪，现已发现其死亡，为期两周的搜寻工作就此结束。
item.description:
A college student who disappeared after leaving a bar in Nashville has been found dead, police say, ending a two-week searchhttps://t.co/Dyg9OaGeYt

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 22, 2024

item.title: 投资者同意让 Truth Social 成为上市公司。这一消息为特朗普带来了数十亿美元的意外之财，但也有一些注意事项。
item.description:
Investors OK a deal to make Truth Social a public company. The news generates a multi-billion dollar windfall for Trump, with caveats. https://t.co/GNJFr01QRy

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 22, 2024

item.title: 俄罗斯和中国否决美国支持的联合国安理会决议，呼吁以色列-哈马斯停火并释放人质
item.description:
Russia and China veto US-backed UN Security Council resolution calling for an Israel-Hamas ceasefire and release of hostages https://t.co/wlrrbwbMaT

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 22, 2024

item.title: 陷入困境的参议员鲍勃-梅嫩德斯宣布不再作为民主党人竞选连任，但希望 "免罪 "能让他作为独立候选人参选
item.description:
Embattled Sen. Bob Menendez announces he will not run for reelection as a Democrat but hopes an "exoneration" will allow him to run as an independenthttps://t.co/m82p6T1ovB

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 21, 2024

item.title: 爱达荷州当局在追捕和枪击三名警官受伤后抓获在逃囚犯和同伙。
item.description:
Authorities capture escaped Idaho inmate and accomplice after manhunt and shooting that left 3 officers injured. https://t.co/3XyPJfliDt

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 21, 2024

item.title: 纽约总检察长办公室采取初步措施，准备查封特朗普的资产，包括高尔夫球场和曼哈顿北部的私人庄园
item.description:
New York attorney general's office takes initial step to prepare to seize Trump's assets, including golf course and private estate north of Manhattan https://t.co/Xn6P1YJClC

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 21, 2024

item.title: CNN 消息人士称，美国将在一项历史性的反垄断投诉中起诉苹果公司，向全球最有价值的公司之一发起挑战
item.description:
US will sue Apple in a historic antitrust complaint, CNN sources say, challenging one of the world's most valuable companies https://t.co/vTGWo1Q47o

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 21, 2024

item.title: 立法者公布 1.2 万亿美元的政府拨款方案，在政府关门最后期限即将到来之际，为通过立法发起了一场高风险冲刺
item.description:
Lawmakers unveil a $1.2 trillion government funding package, setting up a high-stakes sprint to pass the legislation as a shutdown deadline looms https://t.co/2pU4KZM04O

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 21, 2024

item.title: 前警官因折磨两名黑人被判 40 年，法官称他犯下了 "所能想象到的最令人震惊、野蛮和残忍的行为"。
item.description:
Former officer sentenced to 40 years for torture of two Black men after judge says he committed most "shocking, brutal and cruel acts imaginable." https://t.co/7TgAvW5dYp

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 20, 2024

item.title: 阿拉巴马州州长凯-艾维（Kay Ivey）签署了一项大刀阔斧的法案，禁止公立学校和大学开展多元化、公平和包容计划。
item.description:
Alabama Gov. Kay Ivey signs a sweeping bill into law that prohibits diversity, equity, and inclusion programs at public schools and universities. https://t.co/D9ijvLsJqH

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 20, 2024

item.title: 法官允许特朗普及其同案被告就允许法尼-威利斯继续审理 2020 年佐治亚州大选颠覆案的判决提出上诉
item.description:
Judge allows Trump and his co-defendants to appeal a decision that let Fani Willis continue on the 2020 Georgia election subversion case https://t.co/k8Uz6w36N9

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 20, 2024

item.title: 爱尔兰总理利奥-瓦拉德卡宣布意外辞职，称将在继任者就职后立即下台
item.description:
Ireland's Prime Minister Leo Varadkar announces surprise resignation, saying he will step down as soon as a successor can take up officehttps://t.co/ifpWuzYhyq

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 20, 2024

item.title: 美国国务卿布林肯预计将于周五访问以色列，这次访问正值拉法地面行动迫在眉睫之前的敏感时期。
item.description:
US Secretary of State Blinken is expected to travel to Israel Friday, a visit that comes at a sensitive time ahead of a looming Rafah ground operation https://t.co/9N1SzEKmpg

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 20, 2024

item.title: 联邦上诉法院暂时搁置了德克萨斯州备受争议的移民法。法院将于周三听取有关该法律的辩论。
item.description:
A federal appeals court has put Texas' controversial immigration law back on hold. The court will hear arguments about the law Wednesday. https://t.co/hUqJx39rHb

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 20, 2024

item.title: 据 CNN 预测，伯尼-莫雷诺将赢得俄亥俄州共和党参议员初选。这是特朗普的胜利，他曾为这位克利夫兰商人背书。
item.description:
Bernie Moreno will win the Republican Senate primary in Ohio, CNN projects. It's a victory for Trump, who had endorsed the Cleveland businessman. https://t.co/r2J4Twk9qG

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 20, 2024

item.title: 最高法院为得克萨斯州立即开始执行有争议的移民法扫清了障碍
item.description:
Supreme Court clears the way for Texas to immediately begin enforcing a controversial immigration law https://t.co/8MhvLJ7w7q

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 19, 2024

item.title: 前白宫助理彼得-纳瓦罗在白宫历史上首次因藐视法庭而被起诉后，前往联邦监狱报到
item.description:
Ex-White House aide Peter Navarro reports to a federal prison after a contempt prosecution that marks White House history https://t.co/0i1GWiJmvP

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 19, 2024

item.title: 一名前密西西比州副警长因虐待两名黑人被判 20 年监禁。五名前执法人员等待宣判。
item.description:
A former Mississippi sheriff's deputy is sentenced to 20 years over the torture of two Black men. Five ex-law enforcement officers await sentencing. https://t.co/KZynCzmIde

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 19, 2024

item.title: 国会领导人宣布了一项协议，以维持政府在本财政年度的剩余资金。周五晚是通过该协议的最后期限。
item.description:
Congressional leaders announce a deal to keep the rest of the government funded through the fiscal year. There's a Friday night deadline to pass it. https://t.co/MFsvPyFFFW

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 19, 2024

item.title: 香港通过第二部国家安全法，扩大镇压权力，与中国大陆更紧密地接轨
item.description:
Hong Kong passes second national security law, widening crackdown powers and aligning city more closely with mainland China https://t.co/2u9OjpAeFw

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 19, 2024

item.title: 最高法院无限期禁止得克萨斯州执行有争议的移民法。
item.description:
Supreme Court indefinitely blocks Texas from enforcing a controversial immigration law. https://t.co/MMhqFbRVjN

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 18, 2024

item.title: 美国环保局禁止在美国使用石棉。长期以来，这种致癌物质一直与多种癌症有关。
item.description:
The EPA bans the use of asbestos in the US. The carcinogen has long been linked to multiple types of cancer. https://t.co/2uRlwHz6En

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 18, 2024

item.title: 唐纳德-特朗普的律师告诉法庭，他在纽约民事欺诈案中找不到承销商支持其 4.64 亿美元的保证金
item.description:
Donald Trump can't find an underwriter to back his $464 million bond in New York civil fraud case, his lawyers tell court https://t.co/CZqHYj4cOp

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 18, 2024

item.title: 宾夕法尼亚州在 CJ-赖斯入狱十几年后，罕见地撤销了对他的所有指控。原因如下
item.description:
In an extremely rare move, Pennsylvania has dropped all charges against CJ Rice after he spent more than a dozen years in prison. Here's why. https://t.co/CoKM4KrzdP

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 18, 2024

item.title: 在没有可信反对派参与的总统选举之后，俄罗斯总统弗拉基米尔-普京将继续掌权
item.description:
Russia's Vladimir Putin is set to extend his grip on power after a presidential election devoid of credible opposition https://t.co/Clfz3po2BO

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 17, 2024

item.title: 以色列总理内塔尼亚胡告诉美国有线电视新闻网（CNN），参议员查克-舒默批评他的领导能力并呼吁重新选举的讲话 "完全不合适"。
item.description:
Israeli PM Netanyahu tells CNN Sen. Chuck Schumer's speech criticizing his leadership and calling for new elections was "totally inappropriate" https://t.co/ybfIbPibKV

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 17, 2024

item.title: 警方称，华盛顿特区周日早些时候发生枪击事件，造成两人死亡，五人受伤。
item.description:
Two people were killed and five others were wounded in a shooting in Washington, DC, early on Sunday, police said https://t.co/sdCyHNCZt2

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 17, 2024

item.title: 警方称，被控在宾夕法尼亚州杀害 3 人的嫌犯在新泽西州一栋住宅内设置路障后被拘留。
item.description:
Suspect accused of killing 3 people in Pennsylvania is in custody after barricading himself inside a New Jersey home, police say. https://t.co/LTrWDds1IU

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 16, 2024

item.title: 费城附近的一个乡镇发生枪击事件，造成至少三人死亡。警方要求当地居民就地避难。
item.description:
At least three people are dead after a shooting in a township near Philadelphia. Police ask locals to shelter-in-place. https://t.co/BRWVYN8V0w

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 16, 2024
